name: Hells Bend On Wounded Knee (itch)
description:
Fast paced FPS arena shooter inspired by Quake 1, 2, 3 and DOOM. Three years in the making and cancelled in 2016 with a touch of Castlevania. This is an unfinished playable beta that can be completed from start to end. It is here for history and conservation. 

- Machine gun, shotgun, rail gun
- Quake style strife jumping
- Steak, whip, kick or shoot your enemies
- Block bullets with your shield
- 6 arenas + small adventure areas
- Arena bosses, mid bosses and final boss
- Gibs body parts, blow off heads
- Voiced cut scenes and 8-bit style cut scenes
- Collect coins to call in air support
- Original soundtrack
- Jump pads
- Bullet time (slow motion)
- Level up each stage become faster and more powerful
- In game virtual manual 

Can be ran on older GPU's does not render any special lighting effects.
